page.title: 06EDUCATION Primary
page.content:
{Heckington C.E. School { Our school has 156 children and 6 teachers. The Headteacher is Mr. Downing, the other teachers are Mr.Dobson,Mrs.Robertson, Mrs.Kelly, Mrs.Wilkins and Mrs.Reynoldson. There is a school secretary called Mrs.Scott and the caretaker is Mr.Dawson.
The school is in two parts.The old part was built in 1854 and the new part was started in 1962.There are 66 children in the new school and 90 in the old school.In the old school there are two separate playgrounds because a long time ago they used to keep the girls separate from the boys.The children's toilets are in the playgrounds.
